overview: Anna is a wealthy woman and a wise business woman. She runs her successful company with an iron hand, drives luxurious cars and lives in a magnificent villa. Anna has everything to live a happy life. Unfortunately, one day, her world crumbles when she catches Eric, her husband, cheating on her with her best friend. Feeling deeply betrayed, her only mission from now on will be to get her revenge and make Eric suffer as much as she did.
tagline: By revenge, Anna will push back the limits of perversion.
title: The Perverse Games of a Posh Wife
